subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The owner of Big Brown, IEAH Stables, added the nation’s top juvenile filly to its stable with a $5.7 million purchase of Stardom Bound at the Fasig-Tipton sale in Lexington, Ky. The sale of Stardom Bound, coming off a victory at the $2 million Juvenile Fillies, is the first time a horse was sold at auction in the same year as a Breeders’ Cup victory.
